name: Alec Bradley - Mataza - Robusto Gordo
additionalNotes: The Alec Bradley Mataza is a budget-friendly stick that tastes like a premium. Handmade in Honduras, the Alec Bradley Mataza features a dark, sweet Brazilian Mata Fina wrapper with a binder from Honduras, and fillers from Nicaragua and Colombia for a full-bodied smoking experience. Notes of coffee accentuate the Alec Bradley Matazaâ€™s leathery flavor profile.
